channel.title: Nexium Release!
channel.description:
Nexium Release Adding pictures tomorrow sorry
This file contains the client and the server. Download: *
Supports All of the special weapons has a special attack, that works and is 100% perfect. A insane PvP system for pkers. A really huge server with over 40+ players always. We are very huge, we got many locations to go. (over 150). We have very friendly staffs, moderators that are always ready to help. We have ALL SKILLS WORKING, Except dungeoneering of course. We have RAIDs which means you must have 4 people party to start a RAID Boss slaying. You will gain RAID points. We have OVER 30 Bosses in Nexon-World, this means PvM is fun Revevant cave, its wildy and made just like in RuneScape. 24/7 VPS hosted dedicated server, without no fear of lag. It's really nice to play without afraiding of lag. A lot more, come to check youself the rest!

item.title: Nexium Release!
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Virus confirmed, the run.bat is encrypted within the client and the server. You can see it yourself if you wanna risk downloading it (it doesn’t do anything untill you run the batch files)
Sad people do this.

Here’s a segment of the Run.bat if anyone’s interested on what it said… (I’m only providing the last half so people can see it, and for security reasons)

also to anyone truley interested in this actual server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,563888.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Nexium Release!
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

File Size: 10.79MB

Ehemm… That tells me everything, this is what you’ve done:

  • Added a runserver.bat & compiler.bat once you click on one of those, it will add a virus in your PC.
  • Once you run the client.bat your computer will turn off.
  • Once you turn on your computer, you’ll get a error message.
  • When you get this error message you’ll scream.
  • When you return the PC to the supplier he will tell you the file you downloaded had a virus in it.
  • Once you get your PC back will you say the same as RevengePK said
RevengePK:

Virus.

Read full topic
